name: 張瑋倫
objective:
本課程包括在電腦和行動裝置上執行的應用軟體、App、作業系統、網際網路、全球資訊網、大數據、雲端運算等內容，以及穿載裝置、觸控裝置等最新科技的介紹。透過本課程，學生能奠定紮實的電腦知識，更懂得如何運用電腦和善用全球資訊網，瞭解科技趨勢發展並建立宏觀的想法。
This course includes the concepts on computers and mobile devices such as applications, software, operating system, Internet, WWW, big data, cloud computing, wearable devices, and new technologies. Through this course, students can have fundamental knowledge of computers, know more about the utilization of computers and Internet, as well as understand the trends of technology in a macro perspective.
